title: Can't launch LoL
body: For some reason,  I can open the launcher, but I can't actually launch the game. Could anyone tell me the reason as to why that's happening?

replies.body:
There could be a number of issues going on here that's preventing the game from launching. When you say you can't open the launcher, are you able to sign in and the client never loads? Or is this an issue where you can't even get the patcher to launch?

I'll be able to give better context once I know when the game stops working exactly.
Sorry it took me so long to respond, been busy with school. I can launch the patcher, but when I press LAUNCH to be able to log in, it doesn't work.

In cases where you click on launch and nothing ever happens, it's most likely a permissions error. When you launch a program, your pc needs to have certain permissions in place to allow the program to load. If it doesn't, the program may disappear without even giving you an error. Go through our [Permission Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to make sure this isn't the case.

Let me know if this helps!
